General.Name: Tellgen Corp
General.Description: Tellgen Corporation researches and develops, manufactures, and distributes IVDs in China and internationally. It offers tumor markers, human papilloma virus test kits, ToRCH products, Y chromosome microdeletions test kits, and multiplex immunoassay systems. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xiaoqing  Wang
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of Board of Directors, Director of GM's Office & Non-Independent Director

3.Name: Mr. Ye  Sheng
3.Title: Director of R&D and Deputy GM
